00071 struct cfs_cpt_data {
00072         /* serialize hotplug etc */
00073         spinlock_t              cpt_lock;
00074         /* reserved for hotplug */
00075         unsigned long           cpt_version;
00076         /* mutex to protect cpt_cpumask */
00077         struct mutex            cpt_mutex;
00078         /* scratch buffer for set/unset_node */
00079         cpumask_t               *cpt_cpumask;
00080 };
00081 
00082 static struct cfs_cpt_data      cpt_data;
00083 
00084 /* return number of cores in the same socket of \a cpu */
00085 int
00086 cfs_cpu_core_nsiblings(int cpu)
00087 {
00088         int     num;
00089 
00090         mutex_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00091 
00092         cpumask_copy(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask, topology_core_cpumask(cpu));
00093         num = cpumask_weight(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask);
00094 
00095         mutex_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00096 
00097         return num;
00098 }
00099 
00100 /* return cpumask of HTs in the same core */
00101 void
00102 cfs_cpu_ht_siblings(int cpu, cpumask_t *mask)
00103 {
00104         cpumask_copy(mask, topology_sibling_cpumask(cpu));
00105 }
00106 
00107 /* return number of HTs in the same core of \a cpu */
00108 int
00109 cfs_cpu_ht_nsiblings(int cpu)
00110 {
00111         int     num;
00112 
00113         num = cpumask_weight(topology_sibling_cpumask(cpu));
00114 
00115         return num;
00116 }
00117 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpu_ht_nsiblings);
00118 
00119 void
00120 cfs_node_to_cpumask(int node, cpumask_t *mask)
00121 {
00122         const cpumask_t *tmp = cpumask_of_node(node);
00123 
00124         if (tmp != NULL)
00125                 cpumask_copy(mask, tmp);
00126         else
00127                 cpumask_clear(mask);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void
00131 cfs_cpt_table_free(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab)
00132 {
00133         int     i;
00134 
00135         if (cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt != NULL) {
00136                 LIBCFS_FREE(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt,
00137                             num_possible_cpus() *
00138                             sizeof(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[0]));
00139         }
00140 
00141         for (i = 0; cptab->ctb_parts != NULL && i < cptab->ctb_nparts; i++) {
00142                 struct cfs_cpu_partition *part = &cptab->ctb_parts[i];
00143 
00144                 if (part->cpt_nodemask != NULL) {
00145                         LIBCFS_FREE(part->cpt_nodemask,
00146                                     sizeof(*part->cpt_nodemask));
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 if (part->cpt_cpumask != NULL)
00150                         LIBCFS_FREE(part->cpt_cpumask, cpumask_size());
00151         }
00152 
00153         if (cptab->ctb_parts != NULL) {
00154                 LIBCFS_FREE(cptab->ctb_parts,
00155                             cptab->ctb_nparts * sizeof(cptab->ctb_parts[0]));
00156         }
00157 
00158         if (cptab->ctb_nodemask != NULL)
00159                 LIBCFS_FREE(cptab->ctb_nodemask, sizeof(*cptab->ctb_nodemask));
00160         if (cptab->ctb_cpumask != NULL)
00161                 LIBCFS_FREE(cptab->ctb_cpumask, cpumask_size());
00162 
00163         LIBCFS_FREE(cptab, sizeof(*cptab));
00164 }
00165 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_table_free);
00166 
00167 struct cfs_cpt_table *
00168 cfs_cpt_table_alloc(unsigned int ncpt)
00169 {
00170         struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab;
00171         int     i;
00172 
00173         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cptab, sizeof(*cptab));
00174         if (cptab == NULL)
00175                 return NULL;
00176 
00177         cptab->ctb_nparts = ncpt;
00178 
00179         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cptab->ctb_cpumask, cpumask_size());
00180         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cptab->ctb_nodemask, sizeof(*cptab->ctb_nodemask));
00181 
00182         if (cptab->ctb_cpumask == NULL || cptab->ctb_nodemask == NULL)
00183                 goto failed;
00184 
00185         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt,
00186                      num_possible_cpus() * sizeof(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[0]));
00187         if (cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt == NULL)
00188                 goto failed;
00189 
00190         memset(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt, -1,
00191                num_possible_cpus() * sizeof(cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[0]));
00192 
00193         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cptab->ctb_parts, ncpt * sizeof(cptab->ctb_parts[0]));
00194         if (cptab->ctb_parts == NULL)
00195                 goto failed;
00196 
00197         for (i = 0; i < ncpt; i++) {
00198                 struct cfs_cpu_partition *part = &cptab->ctb_parts[i];
00199 
00200                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(part->cpt_cpumask, cpumask_size());
00201                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(part->cpt_nodemask, sizeof(*part->cpt_nodemask));
00202                 if (part->cpt_cpumask == NULL || part->cpt_nodemask == NULL)
00203                         goto failed;
00204         }
00205 
00206         spin_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
00207         /* Reserved for hotplug */
00208         cptab->ctb_version = cpt_data.cpt_version;
00209         spin_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
00210 
00211         return cptab;
00212 
00213  failed:
00214         cfs_cpt_table_free(cptab);
00215         return NULL;
00216 }
00217 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_table_alloc);
00218 
00219 int
00220 cfs_cpt_table_print(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, char *buf, int len)
00221 {
00222         char    *tmp = buf;
00223         int     rc = 0;
00224         int     i;
00225         int     j;
00226 
00227         for (i = 0; i < cptab->ctb_nparts; i++) {
00228                 if (len > 0) {
00229                         rc = snprintf(tmp, len, "%d\t: ", i);
00230                         len -= rc;
00231                 }
00232 
00233                 if (len <= 0) {
00234                         rc = -EFBIG;
00235                         goto out;
00236                 }
00237 
00238                 tmp += rc;
00239                 for_each_cpu(j, cptab->ctb_parts[i].cpt_cpumask) {
00240                         rc = snprintf(tmp, len, "%d ", j);
00241                         len -= rc;
00242                         if (len <= 0) {
00243                                 rc = -EFBIG;
00244                                 goto out;
00245                         }
00246                         tmp += rc;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 *tmp = '\n';
00250                 tmp++;
00251                 len--;
00252         }
00253 
00254  out:
00255         if (rc < 0)
00256                 return rc;
00257 
00258         return tmp - buf;
00259 }
00260 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_table_print);
00261 
00262 int
00263 cfs_cpt_number(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab)
00264 {
00265         return cptab->ctb_nparts;
00266 }
00267 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_number);
00268 
00269 int
00270 cfs_cpt_weight(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00271 {
00272         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00273 
00274         return cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY ?
00275                cpumask_weight(cptab->ctb_cpumask) :
00276                cpumask_weight(cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask);
00277 }
00278 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_weight);
00279 
00280 int
00281 cfs_cpt_online(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00282 {
00283         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00284 
00285         return cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY ?
00286                cpumask_any_and(cptab->ctb_cpumask,
00287                                cpu_online_mask) < nr_cpu_ids :
00288                cpumask_any_and(cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask,
00289                                cpu_online_mask) < nr_cpu_ids;
00290 }
00291 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_online);
00292 
00293 cpumask_t *
00294 cfs_cpt_cpumask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00295 {
00296         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00297 
00298         return cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY ?
00299                cptab->ctb_cpumask : cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask;
00300 }
00301 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_cpumask);
00302 
00303 nodemask_t *
00304 cfs_cpt_nodemask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00305 {
00306         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00307 
00308         return cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY ?
00309                cptab->ctb_nodemask : cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask;
00310 }
00311 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_nodemask);
00312 
00313 int
00314 cfs_cpt_set_cpu(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, int cpu)
00315 {
00316         int     node;
00317 
00318         LASSERT(cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts);
00319 
00320         if (cpu < 0 || cpu >= nr_cpu_ids || !cpu_online(cpu)) {
00321                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "CPU %d is invalid or it's offline\n", cpu);
00322                 return 0;
00323         }
00324 
00325         if (cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu] != -1) {
00326                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "CPU %d is already in partition %d\n",
00327                        cpu, cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu]);
00328                 return 0;
00329         }
00330 
00331         cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu] = cpt;
00332 
00333         LASSERT(!cpumask_test_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_cpumask));
00334         LASSERT(!cpumask_test_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask));
00335 
00336         cpumask_set_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_cpumask);
00337         cpumask_set_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask);
00338 
00339         node = cpu_to_node(cpu);
00340 
00341         /* first CPU of @node in this CPT table */
00342         if (!node_isset(node, *cptab->ctb_nodemask))
00343                 node_set(node, *cptab->ctb_nodemask);
00344 
00345         /* first CPU of @node in this partition */
00346         if (!node_isset(node, *cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask))
00347                 node_set(node, *cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask);
00348 
00349         return 1;
00350 }
00351 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_set_cpu);
00352 
00353 void
00354 cfs_cpt_unset_cpu(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, int cpu)
00355 {
00356         int     node;
00357         int     i;
00358 
00359         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00360 
00361         if (cpu < 0 || cpu >= nr_cpu_ids) {
00362                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Invalid CPU id %d\n", cpu);
00363                 return;
00364         }
00365 
00366         if (cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY) {
00367                 /* caller doesn't know the partition ID */
00368                 cpt = cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu];
00369                 if (cpt < 0) { /* not set in this CPT-table */
00370                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "Try to unset cpu %d which is "
00371                                        "not in CPT-table %p\n", cpt, cptab);
00372                         return;
00373                 }
00374 
00375         } else if (cpt != cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu]) {
00376                 CDEBUG(D_INFO,
00377                        "CPU %d is not in cpu-partition %d\n", cpu, cpt);
00378                 return;
00379         }
00380 
00381         LASSERT(cpumask_test_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask));
00382         LASSERT(cpumask_test_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_cpumask));
00383 
00384         cpumask_clear_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask);
00385         cpumask_clear_cpu(cpu, cptab->ctb_cpumask);
00386         cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu] = -1;
00387 
00388         node = cpu_to_node(cpu);
00389 
00390         LASSERT(node_isset(node, *cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask));
00391         LASSERT(node_isset(node, *cptab->ctb_nodemask));
00392 
00393         for_each_cpu(i, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask) {
00394                 /* this CPT has other CPU belonging to this node? */
00395                 if (cpu_to_node(i) == node)
00396                         break;
00397         }
00398 
00399         if (i >= nr_cpu_ids)
00400                 node_clear(node, *cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask);
00401 
00402         for_each_cpu(i, cptab->ctb_cpumask) {
00403                 /* this CPT-table has other CPU belonging to this node? */
00404                 if (cpu_to_node(i) == node)
00405                         break;
00406         }
00407 
00408         if (i >= nr_cpu_ids)
00409                 node_clear(node, *cptab->ctb_nodemask);
00410 
00411         return;
00412 }
00413 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_unset_cpu);
00414 
00415 int
00416 cfs_cpt_set_cpumask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, cpumask_t *mask)
00417 {
00418         int     i;
00419 
00420         if (cpumask_weight(mask) == 0 ||
00421             cpumask_any_and(mask, cpu_online_mask) >= nr_cpu_ids) {
00422                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "No online CPU is found in the CPU mask "
00423                                "for CPU partition %d\n", cpt);
00424                 return 0;
00425         }
00426 
00427         for_each_cpu(i, mask) {
00428                 if (!cfs_cpt_set_cpu(cptab, cpt, i))
00429                         return 0;
00430         }
00431 
00432         return 1;
00433 }
00434 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_set_cpumask);
00435 
00436 void
00437 cfs_cpt_unset_cpumask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, cpumask_t *mask)
00438 {
00439         int     i;
00440 
00441         for_each_cpu(i, mask)
00442                 cfs_cpt_unset_cpu(cptab, cpt, i);
00443 }
00444 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_unset_cpumask);
00445 
00446 int
00447 cfs_cpt_set_node(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, int node)
00448 {
00449         cpumask_t       *mask;
00450         int             rc;
00451 
00452         if (node < 0 || node >= MAX_NUMNODES) {
00453                 CDEBUG(D_INFO,
00454                        "Invalid NUMA id %d for CPU partition %d\n", node, cpt);
00455                 return 0;
00456         }
00457 
00458         mutex_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00459 
00460         mask = cpt_data.cpt_cpumask;
00461         cfs_node_to_cpumask(node, mask);
00462 
00463         rc = cfs_cpt_set_cpumask(cptab, cpt, mask);
00464 
00465         mutex_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00466 
00467         return rc;
00468 }
00469 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_set_node);
00470 
00471 void
00472 cfs_cpt_unset_node(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, int node)
00473 {
00474         cpumask_t *mask;
00475 
00476         if (node < 0 || node >= MAX_NUMNODES) {
00477                 CDEBUG(D_INFO,
00478                        "Invalid NUMA id %d for CPU partition %d\n", node, cpt);
00479                 return;
00480         }
00481 
00482         mutex_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00483 
00484         mask = cpt_data.cpt_cpumask;
00485         cfs_node_to_cpumask(node, mask);
00486 
00487         cfs_cpt_unset_cpumask(cptab, cpt, mask);
00488 
00489         mutex_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
00490 }
00491 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_unset_node);
00492 
00493 int
00494 cfs_cpt_set_nodemask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, nodemask_t *mask)
00495 {
00496         int     i;
00497 
00498         for_each_node_mask(i, *mask) {
00499                 if (!cfs_cpt_set_node(cptab, cpt, i))
00500                         return 0;
00501         }
00502 
00503         return 1;
00504 }
00505 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_set_nodemask);
00506 
00507 void
00508 cfs_cpt_unset_nodemask(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt, nodemask_t *mask)
00509 {
00510         int     i;
00511 
00512         for_each_node_mask(i, *mask)
00513                 cfs_cpt_unset_node(cptab, cpt, i);
00514 }
00515 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_unset_nodemask);
00516 
00517 void
00518 cfs_cpt_clear(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00519 {
00520         int     last;
00521         int     i;
00522 
00523         if (cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY) {
00524                 last = cptab->ctb_nparts - 1;
00525                 cpt = 0;
00526         } else {
00527                 last = cpt;
00528         }
00529 
00530         for (; cpt <= last; cpt++) {
00531                 for_each_cpu(i, cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask)
00532                         cfs_cpt_unset_cpu(cptab, cpt, i);
00533         }
00534 }
00535 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_clear);
00536 
00537 int
00538 cfs_cpt_spread_node(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00539 {
00540         nodemask_t      *mask;
00541         int             weight;
00542         int             rotor;
00543         int             node;
00544 
00545         /* convert CPU partition ID to HW node id */
00546 
00547         if (cpt < 0 || cpt >= cptab->ctb_nparts) {
00548                 mask = cptab->ctb_nodemask;
00549                 rotor = cptab->ctb_spread_rotor++;
00550         } else {
00551                 mask = cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask;
00552                 rotor = cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_spread_rotor++;
00553         }
00554 
00555         weight = nodes_weight(*mask);
00556         LASSERT(weight > 0);
00557 
00558         rotor %= weight;
00559 
00560         for_each_node_mask(node, *mask) {
00561                 if (rotor-- == 0)
00562                         return node;
00563         }
00564 
00565         LBUG();
00566         return 0;
00567 }
00568 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_spread_node);
00569 
00570 int
00571 cfs_cpt_current(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int remap)
00572 {
00573         int     cpu = smp_processor_id();
00574         int     cpt = cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu];
00575 
00576         if (cpt < 0) {
00577                 if (!remap)
00578                         return cpt;
00579 
00580                 /* don't return negative value for safety of upper layer,
00581                  * instead we shadow the unknown cpu to a valid partition ID */
00582                 cpt = cpu % cptab->ctb_nparts;
00583         }
00584 
00585         return cpt;
00586 }
00587 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_current);
00588 
00589 int
00590 cfs_cpt_of_cpu(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpu)
00591 {
00592         LASSERT(cpu >= 0 && cpu < nr_cpu_ids);
00593 
00594         return cptab->ctb_cpu2cpt[cpu];
00595 }
00596 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_of_cpu);
00597 
00598 int
00599 cfs_cpt_bind(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt)
00600 {
00601         cpumask_t       *cpumask;
00602         nodemask_t      *nodemask;
00603         int             rc;
00604         int             i;
00605 
00606         LASSERT(cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY || (cpt >= 0 && cpt < cptab->ctb_nparts));
00607 
00608         if (cpt == CFS_CPT_ANY) {
00609                 cpumask = cptab->ctb_cpumask;
00610                 nodemask = cptab->ctb_nodemask;
00611         } else {
00612                 cpumask = cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_cpumask;
00613                 nodemask = cptab->ctb_parts[cpt].cpt_nodemask;
00614         }
00615 
00616         if (cpumask_any_and(cpumask, cpu_online_mask) >= nr_cpu_ids) {
00617                 CERROR("No online CPU found in CPU partition %d, did someone "
00618                        "do CPU hotplug on system? You might need to reload "
00619                        "Lustre modules to keep system working well.\n", cpt);
00620                 return -EINVAL;
00621         }
00622 
00623         for_each_online_cpu(i) {
00624                 if (cpumask_test_cpu(i, cpumask))
00625                         continue;
00626 
00627                 rc = set_cpus_allowed_ptr(current, cpumask);
00628                 set_mems_allowed(*nodemask);
00629                 if (rc == 0)
00630                         schedule(); /* switch to allowed CPU */
00631 
00632                 return rc;
00633         }
00634 
00635         /* don't need to set affinity because all online CPUs are covered */
00636         return 0;
00637 }
00638 EXPORT_SYMBOL(cfs_cpt_bind);
00639 
00644 static int
00645 cfs_cpt_choose_ncpus(struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab, int cpt,
00646                      cpumask_t *node, int number)
00647 {
00648         cpumask_t       *socket = NULL;
00649         cpumask_t       *core = NULL;
00650         int             rc = 0;
00651         int             cpu;
00652 
00653         LASSERT(number > 0);
00654 
00655         if (number >= cpumask_weight(node)) {
00656                 while (!cpumask_empty(node)) {
00657                         cpu = cpumask_first(node);
00658 
00659                         rc = cfs_cpt_set_cpu(cptab, cpt, cpu);
00660                         if (!rc)
00661                                 return -EINVAL;
00662                         cpumask_clear_cpu(cpu, node);
00663                 }
00664                 return 0;
00665         }
00666 
00667         /* allocate scratch buffer */
00668         LIBCFS_ALLOC(socket, cpumask_size());
00669         LIBCFS_ALLOC(core, cpumask_size());
00670         if (socket == NULL || core == NULL) {
00671                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00672                 goto out;
00673         }
00674 
00675         while (!cpumask_empty(node)) {
00676                 cpu = cpumask_first(node);
00677 
00678                 /* get cpumask for cores in the same socket */
00679                 cpumask_copy(socket, topology_core_cpumask(cpu));
00680                 cpumask_and(socket, socket, node);
00681 
00682                 LASSERT(!cpumask_empty(socket));
00683 
00684                 while (!cpumask_empty(socket)) {
00685                         int     i;
00686 
00687                         /* get cpumask for hts in the same core */
00688                         cpumask_copy(core, topology_sibling_cpumask(cpu));
00689                         cpumask_and(core, core, node);
00690 
00691                         LASSERT(!cpumask_empty(core));
00692 
00693                         for_each_cpu(i, core) {
00694                                 cpumask_clear_cpu(i, socket);
00695                                 cpumask_clear_cpu(i, node);
00696 
00697                                 rc = cfs_cpt_set_cpu(cptab, cpt, i);
00698                                 if (!rc) {
00699                                         rc = -EINVAL;
00700                                         goto out;
00701                                 }
00702 
00703                                 if (--number == 0)
00704                                         goto out;
00705                         }
00706                         cpu = cpumask_first(socket);
00707                 }
00708         }
00709 
00710  out:
00711         if (socket != NULL)
00712                 LIBCFS_FREE(socket, cpumask_size());
00713         if (core != NULL)
00714                 LIBCFS_FREE(core, cpumask_size());
00715         return rc;
00716 }
00717 
00718 #define CPT_WEIGHT_MIN  4u
00719 
00720 static unsigned int
00721 cfs_cpt_num_estimate(void)
00722 {
00723         unsigned nnode = num_online_nodes();
00724         unsigned ncpu  = num_online_cpus();
00725         unsigned ncpt;
00726 
00727         if (ncpu <= CPT_WEIGHT_MIN) {
00728                 ncpt = 1;
00729                 goto out;
00730         }
00731 
00732         /* generate reasonable number of CPU partitions based on total number
00733          * of CPUs, Preferred N should be power2 and match this condition:
00734          * 2 * (N - 1)^2 < NCPUS <= 2 * N^2 */
00735         for (ncpt = 2; ncpu > 2 * ncpt * ncpt; ncpt <<= 1) {}
00736 
00737         if (ncpt <= nnode) { /* fat numa system */
00738                 while (nnode > ncpt)
00739                         nnode >>= 1;
00740 
00741         } else { /* ncpt > nnode */
00742                 while ((nnode << 1) <= ncpt)
00743                         nnode <<= 1;
00744         }
00745 
00746         ncpt = nnode;
00747 
00748  out:
00749 #if (BITS_PER_LONG == 32)
00750         /* config many CPU partitions on 32-bit system could consume
00751          * too much memory */
00752         ncpt = min(2U, ncpt);
00753 #endif
00754         while (ncpu % ncpt != 0)
00755                 ncpt--; /* worst case is 1 */
00756 
00757         return ncpt;
00758 }
00759 
00760 static struct cfs_cpt_table *
00761 cfs_cpt_table_create(int ncpt)
00762 {
00763         struct cfs_cpt_table *cptab = NULL;
00764         cpumask_t       *mask = NULL;
00765         int             cpt = 0;
00766         int             num;
00767         int             rc;
00768         int             i;
00769 
00770         rc = cfs_cpt_num_estimate();
00771         if (ncpt <= 0)
00772                 ncpt = rc;
00773 
00774         if (ncpt > num_online_cpus() || ncpt > 4 * rc) {
00775                 CWARN("CPU partition number %d is larger than suggested "
00776                       "value (%d), your system may have performance"
00777                       "issue or run out of memory while under pressure\n",
00778                       ncpt, rc);
00779         }
00780 
00781         if (num_online_cpus() % ncpt != 0) {
00782                 CERROR("CPU number %d is not multiple of cpu_npartition %d, "
00783                        "please try different cpu_npartitions value or"
00784                        "set pattern string by cpu_pattern=STRING\n",
00785                        (int)num_online_cpus(), ncpt);
00786                 goto failed;
00787         }
00788 
00789         cptab = cfs_cpt_table_alloc(ncpt);
00790         if (cptab == NULL) {
00791                 CERROR("Failed to allocate CPU map(%d)\n", ncpt);
00792                 goto failed;
00793         }
00794 
00795         num = num_online_cpus() / ncpt;
00796         if (num == 0) {
00797                 CERROR("CPU changed while setting CPU partition\n");
00798                 goto failed;
00799         }
00800 
00801         LIBCFS_ALLOC(mask, cpumask_size());
00802         if (mask == NULL) {
00803                 CERROR("Failed to allocate scratch cpumask\n");
00804                 goto failed;
00805         }
00806 
00807         for_each_online_node(i) {
00808                 cfs_node_to_cpumask(i, mask);
00809 
00810                 while (!cpumask_empty(mask)) {
00811                         struct cfs_cpu_partition *part;
00812                         int    n;
00813 
00814                         /* Each emulated NUMA node has all allowed CPUs in
00815                          * the mask.
00816                          * End loop when all partitions have assigned CPUs.
00817                          */
00818                         if (cpt == ncpt)
00819                                 break;
00820 
00821                         part = &cptab->ctb_parts[cpt];
00822 
00823                         n = num - cpumask_weight(part->cpt_cpumask);
00824                         LASSERT(n > 0);
00825 
00826                         rc = cfs_cpt_choose_ncpus(cptab, cpt, mask, n);
00827                         if (rc < 0)
00828                                 goto failed;
00829 
00830                         LASSERT(num >= cpumask_weight(part->cpt_cpumask));
00831                         if (num == cpumask_weight(part->cpt_cpumask))
00832                                 cpt++;
00833                 }
00834         }
00835 
00836         if (cpt != ncpt ||
00837             num != cpumask_weight(cptab->ctb_parts[ncpt - 1].cpt_cpumask)) {
00838                 CERROR("Expect %d(%d) CPU partitions but got %d(%d), "
00839                        "CPU hotplug/unplug while setting?\n",
00840                        cptab->ctb_nparts, num, cpt,
00841                        cpumask_weight(cptab->ctb_parts[ncpt - 1].cpt_cpumask));
00842                 goto failed;
00843         }
00844 
00845         LIBCFS_FREE(mask, cpumask_size());
00846 
00847         return cptab;
00848 
00849  failed:
00850         CERROR("Failed to setup CPU-partition-table with %d "
00851                "CPU-partitions, online HW nodes: %d, HW cpus: %d.\n",
00852                ncpt, num_online_nodes(), num_online_cpus());
00853 
00854         if (mask != NULL)
00855                 LIBCFS_FREE(mask, cpumask_size());
00856 
00857         if (cptab != NULL)
00858                 cfs_cpt_table_free(cptab);
00859 
00860         return NULL;
00861 }
00862 
00863 static struct cfs_cpt_table *
00864 cfs_cpt_table_create_pattern(char *pattern)
00865 {
00866         struct cfs_cpt_table    *cptab;
00867         char                    *str;
00868         int                     node    = 0;
00869         int                     ncpt    = 0;
00870         int                     high;
00871         int                     cpt;
00872         int                     rc;
00873         int                     c;
00874         int                     i;
00875 
00876         str = cfs_trimwhite(pattern);
00877         if (*str == 'n' || *str == 'N') {
00878                 pattern = str + 1;
00879                 if (*pattern != '\0') {
00880                         node = 1; /* numa pattern */
00881 
00882                 } else { /* shortcut to create CPT from NUMA & CPU topology */
00883                         node = -1;
00884                         ncpt = num_online_nodes();
00885                 }
00886         }
00887 
00888         if (ncpt == 0) { /* scanning bracket which is mark of partition */
00889                 for (str = pattern;; str++, ncpt++) {
00890                         str = strchr(str, '[');
00891                         if (str == NULL)
00892                                 break;
00893                 }
00894         }
00895 
00896         if (ncpt == 0 ||
00897             (node && ncpt > num_online_nodes()) ||
00898             (!node && ncpt > num_online_cpus())) {
00899                 CERROR("Invalid pattern %s, or too many partitions %d\n",
00900                        pattern, ncpt);
00901                 return NULL;
00902         }
00903 
00904         cptab = cfs_cpt_table_alloc(ncpt);
00905         if (cptab == NULL) {
00906                 CERROR("Failed to allocate cpu partition table\n");
00907                 return NULL;
00908         }
00909 
00910         if (node < 0) { /* shortcut to create CPT from NUMA & CPU topology */
00911                 cpt = 0;
00912                 for_each_online_node(i) {
00913                         if (cpt >= ncpt) {
00914                                 CERROR("CPU changed while setting CPU "
00915                                        "partition table, %d/%d\n", cpt, ncpt);
00916                                 goto failed;
00917                         }
00918 
00919                         rc = cfs_cpt_set_node(cptab, cpt++, i);
00920                         if (!rc)
00921                                 goto failed;
00922                 }
00923                 return cptab;
00924         }
00925 
00926         high = node ? MAX_NUMNODES - 1 : nr_cpu_ids - 1;
00927 
00928         for (str = cfs_trimwhite(pattern), c = 0;; c++) {
00929                 struct cfs_range_expr   *range;
00930                 struct cfs_expr_list    *el;
00931                 char                    *bracket = strchr(str, '[');
00932                 int                     n;
00933 
00934                 if (bracket == NULL) {
00935                         if (*str != 0) {
00936                                 CERROR("Invalid pattern %s\n", str);
00937                                 goto failed;
00938                         } else if (c != ncpt) {
00939                                 CERROR("expect %d partitions but found %d\n",
00940                                        ncpt, c);
00941                                 goto failed;
00942                         }
00943                         break;
00944                 }
00945 
00946                 if (sscanf(str, "%d%n", &cpt, &n) < 1) {
00947                         CERROR("Invalid cpu pattern %s\n", str);
00948                         goto failed;
00949                 }
00950 
00951                 if (cpt < 0 || cpt >= ncpt) {
00952                         CERROR("Invalid partition id %d, total partitions %d\n",
00953                                cpt, ncpt);
00954                         goto failed;
00955                 }
00956 
00957                 if (cfs_cpt_weight(cptab, cpt) != 0) {
00958                         CERROR("Partition %d has already been set.\n", cpt);
00959                         goto failed;
00960                 }
00961 
00962                 str = cfs_trimwhite(str + n);
00963                 if (str != bracket) {
00964                         CERROR("Invalid pattern %s\n", str);
00965                         goto failed;
00966                 }
00967 
00968                 bracket = strchr(str, ']');
00969                 if (bracket == NULL) {
00970                         CERROR("missing right bracket for cpt %d, %s\n",
00971                                cpt, str);
00972                         goto failed;
00973                 }
00974 
00975                 if (cfs_expr_list_parse(str, (bracket - str) + 1,
00976                                         0, high, &el) != 0) {
00977                         CERROR("Can't parse number range: %s\n", str);
00978                         goto failed;
00979                 }
00980 
00981                 list_for_each_entry(range, &el->el_exprs, re_link) {
00982                         for (i = range->re_lo; i <= range->re_hi; i++) {
00983                                 if ((i - range->re_lo) % range->re_stride != 0)
00984                                         continue;
00985 
00986                                 rc = node ? cfs_cpt_set_node(cptab, cpt, i) :
00987                                             cfs_cpt_set_cpu(cptab, cpt, i);
00988                                 if (!rc) {
00989                                         cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00990                                         goto failed;
00991                                 }
00992                         }
00993                 }
00994 
00995                 cfs_expr_list_free(el);
00996 
00997                 if (!cfs_cpt_online(cptab, cpt)) {
00998                         CERROR("No online CPU is found on partition %d\n", cpt);
00999                         goto failed;
01000                 }
01001 
01002                 str = cfs_trimwhite(bracket + 1);
01003         }
01004 
01005         return cptab;
01006 
01007  failed:
01008         cfs_cpt_table_free(cptab);
01009         return NULL;
01010 }
01011 
01012 #ifdef CONFIG_HOTPLUG_CPU
01013 static int
01014 cfs_cpu_notify(struct notifier_block *self, unsigned long action, void *hcpu)
01015 {
01016         unsigned int cpu = (unsigned long)hcpu;
01017         bool         warn;
01018 
01019         switch (action) {
01020         case CPU_DEAD:
01021         case CPU_DEAD_FROZEN:
01022         case CPU_ONLINE:
01023         case CPU_ONLINE_FROZEN:
01024                 spin_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01025                 cpt_data.cpt_version++;
01026                 spin_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01027         default:
01028                 if (action != CPU_DEAD && action != CPU_DEAD_FROZEN) {
01029                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "CPU changed [cpu %u action %lx]\n",
01030                                cpu, action);
01031                         break;
01032                 }
01033 
01034                 mutex_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
01035                 /* if all HTs in a core are offline, it may break affinity */
01036                 cpumask_copy(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask,
01037                              topology_sibling_cpumask(cpu));
01038                 warn = cpumask_any_and(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask,
01039                                        cpu_online_mask) >= nr_cpu_ids;
01040                 mutex_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
01041                 CDEBUG(warn ? D_WARNING : D_INFO,
01042                        "Lustre: can't support CPU plug-out well now, "
01043                        "performance and stability could be impacted"
01044                        "[CPU %u action: %lx]\n", cpu, action);
01045         }
01046 
01047         return NOTIFY_OK;
01048 }
01049 
01050 static struct notifier_block cfs_cpu_notifier = {
01051         .notifier_call  = cfs_cpu_notify,
01052         .priority       = 0
01053 };
01054 
01055 #endif
01056 
01057 void
01058 cfs_cpu_fini(void)
01059 {
01060         if (cfs_cpt_table != NULL)
01061                 cfs_cpt_table_free(cfs_cpt_table);
01062 
01063 #ifdef CONFIG_HOTPLUG_CPU
01064         unregister_hotcpu_notifier(&cfs_cpu_notifier);
01065 #endif
01066         if (cpt_data.cpt_cpumask != NULL)
01067                 LIBCFS_FREE(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask, cpumask_size());
01068 }
01069 
01070 int
01071 cfs_cpu_init(void)
01072 {
01073         LASSERT(cfs_cpt_table == NULL);
01074 
01075         memset(&cpt_data, 0, sizeof(cpt_data));
01076 
01077         LIBCFS_ALLOC(cpt_data.cpt_cpumask, cpumask_size());
01078         if (cpt_data.cpt_cpumask == NULL) {
01079                 CERROR("Failed to allocate scratch buffer\n");
01080                 return -1;
01081         }
01082 
01083         spin_lock_init(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01084         mutex_init(&cpt_data.cpt_mutex);
01085 
01086 #ifdef CONFIG_HOTPLUG_CPU
01087         register_hotcpu_notifier(&cfs_cpu_notifier);
01088 #endif
01089 
01090         if (*cpu_pattern != 0) {
01091                 cfs_cpt_table = cfs_cpt_table_create_pattern(cpu_pattern);
01092                 if (cfs_cpt_table == NULL) {
01093                         CERROR("Failed to create cptab from pattern %s\n",
01094                                cpu_pattern);
01095                         goto failed;
01096                 }
01097 
01098         } else {
01099                 cfs_cpt_table = cfs_cpt_table_create(cpu_npartitions);
01100                 if (cfs_cpt_table == NULL) {
01101                         CERROR("Failed to create ptable with npartitions %d\n",
01102                                cpu_npartitions);
01103                         goto failed;
01104                 }
01105         }
01106 
01107         spin_lock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01108         if (cfs_cpt_table->ctb_version != cpt_data.cpt_version) {
01109                 spin_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01110                 CERROR("CPU hotplug/unplug during setup\n");
01111                 goto failed;
01112         }
01113         spin_unlock(&cpt_data.cpt_lock);
01114 
01115         LCONSOLE(0, "HW CPU cores: %d, npartitions: %d\n",
01116                  num_online_cpus(), cfs_cpt_number(cfs_cpt_table));
01117         return 0;
01118 
01119  failed:
01120         cfs_cpu_fini();
01121         return -1;
01122 }
01123 
01124 #endif
